user.title: Coffee Machine Entities
user.description:
Select the entities that control your coffee machine.

[Documentation]({docs_url})

faults.title: Fault Sensors
faults.description: Select all binary sensors that indicate machine faults. Recipe will stop if any of these turn ON.

notify.title: Notifications & Storage
notify.description:
Configure notifications and where to store recipes.

For mobile push, enter the full service name e.g. `notify.mobile_app_my_phone`. Leave as `none` to disable.

data.recipes_file: Recipes YAML filename (relative to HA config dir)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one Coffee Recipe Manager instance is allowed.
